query:
INSERT INTO initiatives (
  id, userId, userRole, userEmail, area,
  title, problemStatement, aiApproach,
  riskLevel, missionAlignmentRating,
  impact, effort, evaluationNotes, priorityQuadrant,
  evaluatedBy, evaluatedAt,
  status, createdAt, updatedAt
) VALUES (
  210001, 1, 'Scheduling Coordinator', 'sarah.johnson@adventhealth.com', 'clinical-operations',
  'Automated Patient Appointment Reminders & Scheduling Optimization',
  'No-show rates average 15-20% across our facilities, leading to wasted appointment slots, reduced revenue, and delayed care for patients who need it. Manual reminder calls are time-consuming and inconsistent.',
  'Implement an automated SMS/email reminder system that sends appointment confirmations and reminders 48 hours and 24 hours before scheduled visits. Include easy rescheduling links and track patient engagement patterns to optimize reminder timing.',
  'Low', 'High',
  'high', 'low', 'Proven ROI with 30-40% reduction in no-shows. Simple integration with existing EHR systems. Vendor solutions readily available (Relatient, Luma Health). Low implementation risk, immediate patient satisfaction impact.',
  'quick-win',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute INSERT INTO initiatives (
  id, userId, userRole, userEmail, area,
  title, problemStatement, aiApproach,
  riskLevel, missionAlignmentRating,
  impact, effort, evaluationNotes, priorityQuadrant,
  evaluatedBy, evaluatedAt,
  status, createdAt, updatedAt
) VALUES (
  210001, 1, 'Scheduling Coordinator', 'sarah.johnson@adventhealth.com', 'clinical-operations',
  'Automated Patient Appointment Reminders & Scheduling Optimization',
  'No-show rates average 15-20% across our facilities, leading to wasted appointment slots, reduced revenue, and delayed care for patients who need it. Manual reminder calls are time-consuming and inconsistent.',
  'Implement an automated SMS/email reminder system that sends appointment confirmations and reminders 48 hours and 24 hours before scheduled visits. Include easy rescheduling links and track patient engagement patterns to optimize reminder timing.',
  'Low', 'High',
  'high', 'low', 'Proven ROI with 30-40% reduction in no-shows. Simple integration with existing EHR systems. Vendor solutions readily available (Relatient, Luma Health). Low implementation risk, immediate patient satisfaction impact.',
  'quick-win',
  'Irvin Cruz', NOW(),
  'pending', NOW(), NOW()
);
